DOC.brief_summary: Tumor primary public health problem incidence esophageal cancer show increase trend past thirty year . According statistic 2015 , new onset esophageal cancer 477,900 yearly . The mainly pathologic type esophageal cancer China esophageal squamous cell carcinoma , account 90 % patient China . With development endoscopic technics , patient choose receive endoscopic procedure rather traditional surgery . However , long-term efficacy outcomes patient superficial esophageal squamous cell carcinoma receive different intervention remain unclear . Thus , investigator aim conduct multi-center retrospective study investigate long term outcomes superficial esophageal squamous cell carcinoma patient receive endoscopic treatment surgery .
